jobTitle: Part time Arcade Operation Staff/ Riverside, CA
description: Operation of Arcade game machines, such as replenishing prizes, cleaning the machines, and managing prize inventory (including reporting the inventory every three months). Simple maintenance of arcade game machines. Submitting online report with pictures to headquarters by smartphone app. Cash counting and depositing to the nearest bank or ATM (1-2 times a month). Other simple tasks (Machine cleaning, floor cleaning) will be requested. You will work alone as HQ supports you online. Japanese-speaker preferred.
